name: Verlet Ascend [Demo]
description:
Verlet Ascend is a physics based, roguelike precision platformer where you climb and fight your way up an endless cave.

MoveArrow Keys / WSADShootLeft Mouse ButtonJump / Double JumpRight Mouse Button / SpaceCatch RopesRight Mouse Button / Space

This is an in development demo of the game. The game will be released on steam soon! Right now your feedback is very valuable in this phace of the development. Please share your ideas on upgrades, new weapons, new enemies or any kind of improvement I can add to the game!

Thank you for playing it!
